title: Chrome for desktop update supercharges Google Lens
content:
Chrome is one of the most commonly used web browsers on desktop computers. It offers a wide variety of features and extras that aren’t as well (if at all) integrated on some of its rivals. From its instant data sync across all supported platforms, to the page translations that retain context, to its rich library

The post Chrome for desktop update supercharges Google Lens appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A recent update to Chrome for desktop has introduced a mightier Google Lens with instant, contextual translations, and more.
